Posts.Content: Thank you Kacang i know its best to get it seen to and I am glad she is being thorough just so tired.
Posts.Title: MRI for changes in other breast

Posts.Content: Having a moment.!!!! Finished radiotherapy on Feb 3rd for my left breast. Some time in January I noticed by right breast was starting to invert slightly next to nipple. Ignored it thinking i was being paranoid. Spoke to my husband who said it felt firmer than usual. Kept an eye on it it kept doing strange things. Phoned BCN and she spoke to consultant. Saw consultant last Friday 17th who saw what i meant, mammogram and ultrasound showed nothing. But as i had ilc and idc in left breast sending me for MRI. Saw images of mammogram aerola folded in half didn't do that at last mammogram. I don't want to do this again.
Posts.Title: MRI for changes in other breast

Posts.Content: Hi Jane,  Just to try and reassure you, I had cancer in my first lymph node and then have gone on to have a full node clearance. The rest of the nodes are clear which is good. Even though it had started to spread I still do not have to have chemo, I am in a percentage group where i could have chemo or not the choice is mine. improvement percentage to me didn't seem worth the treatment so have stuck with radiotherapy followed by tamoxifen. Try not to worry
Posts.Title: Worried about pathology report

Posts.Content: Just as i thought was going to get an answer, mri machine packed in today got to wait til next month to see if this stupid cancers hiding in my other breast.
Posts.Title: MRI machine broke got to wait another month

Posts.Content: Booked in Friday. Having MRI as my other breast had lobular cancer which doesn't always show on mammograms
Posts.Title: MRI machine broke got to wait another month

Posts.Content: Debs Am doing ok now. Tuesday i had my biggest breakdown since finding out last september i had cancer. Now i only have a week to wait to see if its moved to my other breast. Waiting sucks was the worst bit before. I am in pain with my arm from full node clearance. But i can do this whatever it is. Hope you are doing ok too
Posts.Title: MRI machine broke got to wait another month

Posts.Content: Trying to get hold of my consultant its ridiculous
